title: H. Rider Haggard | King Solomon's Mines (1937) Action, Adventure | Colorized Movie, subtitles

sources.title: H. Rider Haggard | King Solomon's Mines (1937) Action, Adventure | Colorized Movie, subtitles
sources.description:
SPURRED ON BY A BEAUTIFUL GIRL, men set out to find the world's richest mines!
Hunter Allan Quartermain and his enigmatic guide Umbopa, help a young Irish woman locate her missing father in unexplored Darkest Africa.

Original title: King Solomon's Mines (1937)

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/QL1VHwAd18s


Directors: Robert Stevenson, Geoffrey Barkas
Writers: Henry Rider Haggard (1885 novel), Michael Hogan, Roland Pertwee
Stars: Paul Robeson, Cedric Hardwicke, Anna Lee, Roland Young
Genres: Colorized movie, Action, Adventure, Literature Musical, Romance
